dbQuery.query: WITH granted_lpu AS (SELECT rf.value srv_district_id FROM web50.b_user_to_b_role u2r JOIN web50.b_role_to_b_policy r2p ON u2r.role_id = r2p.role_id JOIN web50.b_policy_rules pr ON r2p.policy_id = pr.policy_id JOIN web50.b_policy_rule_filters rf ON pr.rule_id = rf.rule_id WHERE user_id = :USER_ID AND pr.class_id = 'PODS_SRV_DISTRICT_GCL' AND rf.operator = '='), some_grants AS (SELECT 1 FROM web50.b_user_to_b_role u2r JOIN web50.b_role_to_b_policy r2p ON u2r.role_id = r2p.role_id JOIN web50.b_policy_rules pr ON r2p.policy_id = pr.policy_id WHERE user_id = :USER_ID AND pr.class_id = 'PODS_SRV_DISTRICT_GCL' and pr.select_permitted > 0) SELECT CODE,DESCR FROM ( SELECT srv_district_id CODE ,description DESCR ,CASE WHEN srv_district_id = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END sorter FROM pods.srv_district_gcl lpu WHERE (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM granted_lpu gl WHERE TO_CHAR(lpu.srv_district_id) = gl.srv_district_id) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM some_grants)) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM some_grants)) ORDER BY SORTER,LOWER(DESCR)

SELECT CODE, DESCR FROM ( SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION DESCR ,CASE WHEN CODE = 'UNKNOWN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END SORTER FROM pods.route_type_cl rt WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.route r WHERE r.type_cl = rt.code AND r.line_id IN ({LINE_ID_FILTER}))) ORDER BY SORTER,UPPER(DESCR)

WITH granted_lpu AS (SELECT rf.value srv_district_id FROM web50.b_user_to_b_role u2r JOIN web50.b_role_to_b_policy r2p ON u2r.role_id = r2p.role_id JOIN web50.b_policy_rules pr ON r2p.policy_id = pr.policy_id JOIN web50.b_policy_rule_filters rf ON pr.rule_id = rf.rule_id WHERE user_id = :USER_ID AND pr.class_id = 'PODS_SRV_DISTRICT_GCL' AND rf.operator = '='), some_grants AS (SELECT 1 FROM web50.b_user_to_b_role u2r JOIN web50.b_role_to_b_policy r2p ON u2r.role_id = r2p.role_id JOIN web50.b_policy_rules pr ON r2p.policy_id = pr.policy_id WHERE user_id = :USER_ID AND pr.class_id = 'PODS_SRV_DISTRICT_GCL' and pr.select_permitted > 0), good_lines AS (SELECT line_id ,line_id CODE ,CASE WHEN line_id = 0 THEN 'Неизвестно' ELSE description END DESCR ,CASE WHEN line_id = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END sorter FROM pods.line ln WHERE ln.description IS NOT NULL) SELECT CODE,DESCR FROM (SELECT * FROM good_lines ln WHERE ln.line_id = ANY (SELECT r.line_id FROM pods.route r JOIN pods.series s ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id JOIN pods.location l ON l.location_id = sp.location_id WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM granted_lpu gl WHERE gl.srv_district_id = TO_CHAR(l.srv_district_gcl))) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM some_grants) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM good_lines ln WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.route r JOIN pods.series s ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id WHERE ln.line_id = r.line_id) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM some_grants)) all_data ORDER BY SORTER,LOWER(DESCR)

SELECT CODE,DESCR FROM ( SELECT srv_district_id CODE ,description DESCR ,CASE WHEN srv_district_id = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END sorter FROM pods.srv_district_gcl lpu WHERE lpu.srv_district_id IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) ORDER BY SORTER,LOWER(DESCR)

SELECT CODE, DESCR FROM ( SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION DESCR ,CASE WHEN CODE = 'UNKNOWN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END SORTER FROM pods.route_type_cl rt WHERE code IN ({ROUTE_TYPE_FILTER})) ORDER BY SORTER,UPPER(DESCR)
SELECT LINE_ID AS CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR FROM PODS.LINE WHERE DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL AND LINE_ID IN ({LINE_ID_FILTER}) ORDER BY LOWER(DESCRIPTION)
